# Load/Store Instructions Test

# --- STORES ---
# SW x2, 0(x0)  (store word x2=10 to mem[0])
00000000001000000010000000100011
# SH x2, 2(x0)  (store halfword x2=10 to mem[2])
00000000001000000001000100100011
# SB x2, 4(x0)  (store byte x2=10 to mem[4])
00000000001000000000001000100011

# NOPs to flush store hazard before loads
00000000000000000000000000010011
00000000000000000000000000010011
00000000000000000000000000010011

# --- LOADS ---
# LW  x22, 20(x0)  (load word from pre-initialized mem[20] = 0xABCDEF01)
00000001010000000010101100000011
# LB  x22, 0(x0)   (load byte from mem[0], expect 0x0000000A)
00000000000000000000101100000011
# LH  x22, 0(x0)   (load halfword from mem[0], expect 0x0000000A)
00000000000000000001101100000011
# LBU x22, 0(x0)   (load byte unsigned from mem[0], expect 0x0000000A)
00000000000000000100101100000011
# LHU x22, 0(x0)   (load halfword unsigned from mem[0], expect 0x0000000A)
00000000000000000101101100000011
